parameters.name: columns
parameters.desc: It contains two or more variables of the input dataset. They should be Real, Float, Integer. It cannot be empty.

parameters.name: k
parameters.desc: It is the number of the clusters. It should be integer.

parameters.name: dataset
parameters.desc: It contains the names of one or more datasets, in which the algorithm will be executed. It cannot be empty.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.desc: It contains a filtering operation. It can be empty.
